metadata.name: Potential Suspicious Mofcomp Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the "mofcomp" utility as a child of a suspicious shell or script running utility or by having a suspicious path in the commandline. The "mofcomp" utility parses a file containing MOF statements and adds the classes and class instances defined in the file to the WMI repository. Attackers abuse this utility to install malicious MOF scripts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mofcomp.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('mofcomp.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wsl.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%'))) AND NOT (lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\wbem\\wmiprvse.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.mof'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.mof'))))
